data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Paulo Minatel Gonella, Fernando Rivadavia, Andreas Fleischmann (2015): Drosera magnifica (Droseraceae): the largest New World sundew, discovered on Facebook. Phytotaxa 220 (3): 257-267, DOI: 10.11646/phytotaxa.220.3.4
